discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-body: Uramenyeshwa iyo hagize ugira icyo avuga kuri iki kiganiro. Ushobora guhitamo guhindura ibyo umenyeshwa uko ubishaka.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-talkpages}}|urubuga rw'ibiganiro]] niho abantu baganirira uburyo bwo gukora ibiri kuri {{SITENAME}} mu buryo bwiza bushoboka. Ushobora gukoresha uru rubuga kugirsngo utangire kuganira n'abandi mu buryo bwo kwiteza imbere [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]].
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self: Abantu kuri {{SITENAME}} bashobora gukoresha iyi[[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|urubuga rw'ibiganiro]] Kohereza ubutumwa rusange bwawe kandi uzabimenyeshwa nibabikora.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-ano:
Abantu kuri {{SITENAME}} bashobora gukoresha iyi [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|urubuga rw'ibiganiro]] kohereza ubutumwa rusange kubyerekeye ibyahinduwe bikozwe na aderesi ya IP ukoresha ubu.

Aderesi nyinshi za IP zihinduka mu gihe, kandi akenshi zisangirwa n'abantu benshi. Ushobora[$1 gukora konti] cyangwa [$2 injira] kugirango wirinde urujijo mugihe kizaza nabandi bakoresha. Gukora konti nabyo bihisha aderesi ya IP.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|urubuga rw'ibiganiro]] niho abantu baganirira uburyo bwo gukora kuri {{SITENAME}} muburyo bwiza bushoboka. Tangira ikiganiro gishya cyo guhuza no gufatanya {{GENDER:{{PAGENAME}}|hamwe}} [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}|{{PAGENAME}}]]. Ibyo uvuze hano bizashyirwa kumugaragaro kugirango abandi babibone.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user-ano: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|Urubuga rw'ibiganiro]] Niho abantu baganirira uburyo bwo gukora ibiri kuri {{SITENAME}} mu buryo bwiza bushoboka. Koresha uru rubuga kugirango utangire ikiganiro kijyanye no guhindura byakozwe muri adress ya IP. Ibyo uvuga hano bizashyirwa ahagaragara kugirango abandi babibone. Aderesi nyinshi za IP zihinduka mugihe, kandi akenshi zisangirwa n'abantu benshi.
discussiontools-error-comment-conflict: Igitekerezo cyawe nticyashoboye kubikwa,kuko hari undi watanze igitekerezo mu gihe kimwe nawe. Mwongere mugerageze, cyangwa cyangwa usubiremo urubuga kugirango urebe ibitekerezo biheruka.
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Ntushoboye kubona igitekerezo usubiza kuri uru rubuga. Bishobora kuba byarasibwe cyangwa byimuriwe kurundi rubuga.
discussiontools-error-comment-is-transcl: Ihuza"{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" ntirishobora gukoreshwa mugusubiza iki gitekereo. kugirango usubize, koresha ikosora ry'urubuga ryuzuye ukanda "$1".
Ihuza"{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" ntirishobora gukoreshwa mu guhuza iki gitekerezo kuko cyashyizwe kurundi rubuga. Kugirango usubize, jya hano: [[$1]].
discussiontools-error-comment-not-saved: Igitekerezo cyawe ntigishobora gutangazwa kuri verisiyo iheruka y;urubuga. Kugirango ubone impinduka ziheruka, koporora igitekerezo cyawe wateguye hanyuma ukoreshe mushakisha yawe kugirango wongere ufungure urubuga.
discussiontools-error-lint: Ibitekerezo kuri uru rubuga ntibishora gusubizwa kubera ikosa muri wikitext. Ushobora kwiga ibyerekeye iri kosa ukoreshye [$1 usoma inyandiko], saba ubufasha ukoresheje [$2 wohereze hano] cyangwa ukosore ikosa ukoresheje [$3 gufungura ikosora ry'urubuga ryuzuye].
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove: Ihangane, guhindura uburyo bwo kureba byahagaritswe kuko $1 byagaragagaye mu bitekerezo wanditse. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:DiscussionTools/Reply_tool_visual_mode_limitations kwiga byinshi].
discussiontools-newtopic-missing-title: Tanga umutwe w'ibiganiro byawe.Niba ukanza "{{int:discussiontools-replywidget-newtopic}}", ingingo yawe izongerwaho nta mutwe.
discussiontools-notification-subscribed-: {{PLURAL:$1|Igisubizo kimwe gishya|$1 ibisubizo bishya|100=ibisubizo byishya birenze ijana}} muri"$3".
discussiontools-preference-autotopicsub-: Mugihe utangiye ikiganiro gishya cyangwa igitekerezo mu biganiro bihari, uzahita umenyeshwa mu gihe abandi bashyizeho ibitekerezo bishya.
discussiontools-preference-description:
Gushoboza ibiranga urubuga rw'ibiganiro byigerageza:
* [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk_pages_project/Replying Reply] kuganira kubitekerezo by'urubuga ukanze rimwe.
* [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk_pages_project/New_discussion Add new topics] ukoresheje ifomu yo kuri murandasi.
* [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk_pages_project/Notifications akira imenyesha] iyo ibitekerezo bishya byongewe mubice wiyandikishijemo.

Ushobora guhitamo ibi biranga [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-editing-discussion|preferences]].

Ibishya bizashyirwa kuri [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk_pages_project/kuvugurura urubuga rw'ibiganiro umushinga wo kuvugurura urubuga].

Menya neza:
* mu gihe, ibiranga ubushakashatsi bushya buzongerwamo.
* bimwe mu biranga byavuzwe haruguru ntibishobora kuboneka kuri wiki yawe.
discussiontools-preference-newtopictool-: Ibi bizakwereka urubuga kuri murandasi rwo kongeramo ingingo nshya.
discussiontools-preference-replytool-hel: Ibi bizakwereka umurongo wo gusubiza ibitekerezo ku rubuga rw'ibiganiro ukanze rimwe.
discussiontools-preference-sourcemodetoo: Gushoboza ibikoresho byo guhindura mu buryo bw'inkomoko
Ibi bizongeramo igikoresho cy'ibisubizo byihuse hamwe n'ingingo yihuse yongeramo ibiranga inkomoko y'uburyo bukubiyemo amahinanzira yo gu pinginga no kongeramo amahuza.
discussiontools-preference-summary: Ushobora kwiga byinshi kuriyi ngingo usoma [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Talk_pages_project/Feature_summary feature summary].
discussiontools-preference-topicsubscrip: Ibi bizagufasha kwiyandikisha kugirango wakire imenyesha kubyerekeye ibitrekerezo ku ngingo zitandukanye.
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon: Uzi neza ko ushaka kureka kureka igitekerezo wanditse?
discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic: Uzi neza ko ushaka kureka gutanga ingingo wanditse?
discussiontools-replywidget-anon-warning: Ntabwo winjiye. Kwakira ibiranga izina ryawe aho kuba aderesi ya IP, ushobora kwinjira[$1] cyangwa [$2 ugakora konti].
discussiontools-replywidget-signature-bo: $1 byahinduwe muri sinye yawe. Guhindura andika $2. Menya ko udakeneye gusinya ibitekerezo hamwe niki gikoresho. Umukono wawe uzingerwaho byikora.
discussiontools-replywidget-terms-click: Kanda "$1", kwemera kubijyanye no gukoresha iyi wiki.
discussiontools-replywidget-watchthis: Ongera uru rupapuro ku rutonde rwawe[[Special:Watchlist|urutonde]]
discussiontools-target-comment-missing: Iki gitekerezo nticyabonetse. Bishobora kuba byarasibwe cg byarimuwe
discussiontools-target-comments-missing: Ibitekerezo bishya ntibyabonetse. Bishobora kuba byarasibwe cyangwa byarimuwe.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-button: Kwiyandikisha kugirango wakire amatangazo kubyerekeye ibitekerezo bishya.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-notify: {{GENDER:|Wowe}} Uzakira amatangazo kubyerekeye ibitekerezo bishya kuri iyi ngingo.
{{GENDER:|Wowe}} Ntuzongera kwakira amatangazo kubyerekeye ibitekerezo bishya kuri iyi ngingo.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-specia:
Kwiyandikisha bigufasha gukurikira ingingo k'urubuga bw'ibiganiro.Iyo umuntu asubije ku ngingo, uzakira itangazo.

Hindura uburyo naho wakirira aya matangazo muri ukunda[[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo| ibyo ukunda]].
echo-pref-tooltip-dt-subscription: Menyesha iyo umuntu ashyizeho igitekerezo gishya ku ngingo niyandikishijeho.
tag-discussiontools-added-comment-descri: Igitekerezo cyo kurubuga rw'ibiganiro cyongerewe muri iri kosora
tag-discussiontools-edit-description: Umukoresha yakosoye igitekerezo gihari akoresheje DiscussionTools
tag-discussiontools-newtopic-description: Umukoresha yongeyeho ingingo nshya ku rubuga akoresheje DiscussionTools
tag-discussiontools-source-enhanced-desc: DiscussionTools yari muburyo bw'inkomoko yongerewe imbaraga hamwe n'umwanyabikoresho
